name: Don Potato: Survival at the Underground
name_original: Don Potato: Survival at the Underground
description:
Rogue-lite platformer, shooter game that lets you control a mythical potato stuck under the ground. 

Live the first adventure of a potato that has woken up underground after something happened on the surface. Try your hardest to survive and make it out alive to see the light of day.

This game is a playable prototype of a game that I worked on while I studied this semester. And it's also the first chapter of Don Potato's adventures. I used sprites and randomly generated environments instead of tiles for the procedural levels for this.

It may change or become something else. There are many features like upgrades that I didn't integrate.
